physicalDescription.extent: 2 item (photograph), 4 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#417 Gregori Mogilner Mattress Factory, Denver 1909 copy- slightly dif.'' On back of one photograph: ''Gregori (Harry) Mogilner, Abe's father, making mattresses in Denver factory 1909. In 1925 he moved to Colorado Springs and bought mattress factory from Max Mogilner, a cousin. #417.'' On back of one photograph: ''Gregori (Harry) Mogilner, working in a Denver mattress factory, 1909. In 1925 moved to Colorado Springs & bought mattress factory from cousin Max Mogilner, #417.''

mods.abstract: Gregori (Harry) Mogilner stitching a mattress in his factory during the early 20th century.
